
Show the status of omni

This will show the configuration that omni is loading when called from the current
directory.

Usage: omni status [OPTIONS]

Options:
  --shell-integration <SHELL_INTEGRATION>
                                 Show if the shell integration is loaded or not.
  --config <CONFIG>              Show the configuration that omni is using for the current
                                 directory. This is not shown by default.
  --config-files <CONFIG_FILES>  Show the configuration files that omni is loading for the
                                 current directory.
  --worktree <WORKTREE>          Show the default worktree.
  --orgs <ORGS>                  Show the organizations.
  --path <PATH>                  Show the current omnipath.

Source: builtin
